subject: Changing TestReult in a test-case
msgSnippet: Hi All, I have a program which takes in a file, processes it and creates a new file. I also have lots of test data, input files/ extected results.  Also,
messageBody:
Hi All,
I have a program which takes in a file, processes it and creates a
new file. I also have lots of test data, input files/ extected
results. Also, developers keep adding to this list of files.
I would like to write a testCase which would get all files from a
folder, and checked if the results are fine. (in a for/while loop).
For this, i will have a single test-case method. However, the problem
is i would like the test's to
1) Run for all test-case and not stop if one fails.
2) Have more info in the TestResult. Not just details of the one
method. Ideally, within the test case, i would like to add details
into the TEstResult indicating for which files the tests failed.
How do i do this using junit ?

Thanks,
~preetham
